entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Ogoki
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:42 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -17.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Ogoki Post Airport 12:57 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -17.6°C
Pressure: 99.8 kPa
Visibility: 1.6 km
Humidity: 84 %
Wind Chill: -27
Dewpoint: -19.6°C
Wind: ENE 18 km/h gust 30 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h late this afternoon. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 27 this morning and minus 32 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 39.
entry.summary: Snow ending early this evening then clearing. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 39. Wind chill minus 32 this evening and minus 49 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023
